overview: 16-year-old Gerasim lives in a family of wandering artists. He is forced to travel all over he country with his parents in a house on wheels. gerasim fulfills a unique task in the family to promote his parents' fire show: he stands as a living statue with a poster, inviting passers-by to the performance. thus he also enriches the family budget. gerasim is soundless but very observant, and his main dream is to find a real home to stay in. an unexpected appearance of the girl lyopa, whose voice has been echoing in his head for a long time, disturbs his usual course of life and makes him step out of character.
title: Double Planet Theory
